Vector2D
description:
Vector2D is a general geometry structure we use for all coordinates.
WE can replace the class with a full featured math vector module later.

FZZ
description: FZZ is the root object of each fzz file

params.name: opt.uri
params.description: name of the fzz (zip archive) file

params.name: opt.zip
params.description: the list of files contained at the fzz archive

description: e.g. getting the path from a fzz.object

content:
# fzz-js [![](https://paulvollmer.net/fzz-js/badge.svg)](https://paulvollmer.net/fzz-js/)

fritzing fzz javascript library

## Development
```sh
yarn install
make test
```

and int your files after changes
```sh
make lint
```

to build an es5 compatible version run
```sh
make build
```

## License
[MIT-LICENSE](LICENSE)
name: ./README.md

content:
{
  "name": "fzz-js",
  "version": "0.2.0",
  "description": "fritzing fzz javascript library",
  "author": "Paul Vollmer",
  "license": "MIT",
  "keywords": [
    "fritzing",
    "fzz"
  ],
  "homepage": "https://github.com/paulvollmer/fzz-js#readme",
  "repository": {
    "type": "git",
    "url": "git+https://github.com/paulvollmer/fzz-js.git"
  },
  "bugs": {
    "url": "https://github.com/paulvollmer/fzz-js/issues"
  },
  "main": "index.js",
  "scripts": {
    "pretest": "make lint",
    "test": "make test",
    "precommit": "make lint",
    "prepush": "make lint"
  },
  "jest": {
    "verbose": true,
    "collectCoverage": true
  },
  "devDependencies": {
    "babel-cli": "^6.26.0",
    "babel-plugin-add-header-comment": "^1.0.3",
    "babel-preset-env": "^1.6.1",
    "esdoc": "^1.0.4",
    "esdoc-ecmascript-proposal-plugin": "^1.0.0",
    "esdoc-standard-plugin": "^1.0.0",
    "eslint": "^4.18.0",
    "eslint-config-google": "^0.9.1",
    "husky": "^0.14.3",
    "jest": "^22.0.6"
  },
  "dependencies": {
    "bluebird": "^3.5.1",
    "fritzing-js": "github:fritzing/fritzing-js",
    "fzp-js": "github:fritzing/fzp-js#develop",
    "jszip": "^3.1.5",
    "jszip-utils": "^0.0.2",
    "request": "^2.83.0",
    "xml2js": "^0.4.19"
  }
}
